navbar.description: uSite is a cloud-based web platform that allows everyone to easily create their own website

header.3: USITE supports you from A to Z in the creation of your WEB site

part1.2: Make your life easier by selecting your site from our selection of ready-to-use sites!
part1.3: Modify the text, images and colors as you see fit

part2.1: Can't find what you're looking for? Create your own site!
part2.2: If no ready-to-use site suits you, you can create your own custom site!
part2.3: Keep only the best of each site that we offer you.

part3.title: Develop your online presence with our tools

card1.title: PERSONALIZATION
card1.body: Our modification studio is maximized so that you can express your creativity with advanced customization.

card2.title: NO ADVERTISING
card2.body: We believe you deserve the best, without advertising. Your visibility without distraction for your users, and it's free!

part3.1: And what's more, it's 100% made in France
part3.2: Our project is based on 100% French know-how
part3.3: Our sites are hosted on French soil.

part4.2: All aspects have been studied to offer you extraordinary performance: the code, the services, the infrastructure...
part4.3: On our infrastructure, your sites load in a flash, even with a 2002 internet connection!

part5.title: A problem? We're here!
part5.body: Since your image is our priority, our experts are listening to you and solve your problems as quickly as possible.

header.1: Creating a website has never been easier!
header.2: Our tools are optimized for creating your image.

part1.title: Why choose our tool?
part1.1: We created it to make your life easier. This tool was created to make the WEB accessible to everyone.
part1.2: It's efficient and fluid while being elegant. It will delight you and improve your presence on the web.

part2.title: Design everything yourself
part2.1: Choose the components you want and customize them: colors, size, font, border etc...
part2.2: With our tools, keep only what you want to keep.

support.title: Get started!
support.1: Our dedicated team will be happy to answer you
